Title: TFS Process Dashboard Integration
Description: Small tool which allows integration of Team Foundation Server source control with the Process Dashboard line counter.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Small tool which allows integration of Team Foundation Server source control with the Process Dashboard line counter.


This project should allow you to have an integrated TFS Line counter with process dashboard.

There is a small installer that will check to ensure that you have all the files needed and put them in place if not.

Update the ProjectSpecificLanguageFilter-template.xml file to customize the filter used for your specific project.

There are some know issue with the installer on Windows 7 since it is trying to access your Program Files folder. This needs to be fixed.
